Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: NguAllâh Owanenzela ubusuku ukuze niphumle ngabo nemini (ukuba) ininike ukubona. Inene uAllâh nguMnini- Bubele eluntwini. Kodwa uninzi lwabantu alunambulelo
NguAllâh ke loWo, iNkosi yakho, uMdali wezinto zonke; akukho thixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaKhe, kanti nimfamekiseke njani na
(Nabangaphambili) kunani baya bamfamekiseka ngolo hlobo, besala iiVesi zika-Allâh

NguAllâh Onenzele umhlaba waba yindawo yokuzinza nesibhakabhaka saba luphahla, Wanibumba, Wanifezekisela izimo zenu Wanibonelela ngezinto ezilungileyo. NguAllâh ke loWo, iNkosi yenu; Usikelelekile uAllâh iNkosi, uMlondolozi wamaphakade.’’
Yena Uphila ngonaphakade, akukho thixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaKhe, ngoko thandazani kuYe, ninyanisekile kuYe enkolweni, iindumiso zonke mazibe kuAllâh iNkosi yamaphakade
Yithi (Muhammad): “Inene mna ndalelwa ukuba ndinqule abo nibanqulayo ngaphandle koAllâh, nje ukufika kwemiqondiso evela eNkosini yam, kwaye mna ndiyalelwe ukuba ndizinikele eNkosini yamaphakade.’’

Nguye Owanidalayo ngothuli, emva koko ngeqabaza lembewu yomntu, emva koko ngehlwili elinamathelayo; emva koko Unikhuphela ngaphandle ningabantwana, Aphinde Aniphucule nifikelele ebuntwini, Niphinde nibe ngamaxhego. Ukanti phakathi kwenu kukho abo bathatyathwa bafe phambi (koko) khona ukuze nifikelele kwithuba elithile; mhlawumbi niya kuyisebenzisa ingqiqo
NguYe Onika ubomi Enze ukufa; Xa Emisela into Usuka Athi kuyo: “Yibakho”, ibekho
